name: Don't Boop My Booper
description:
Descend into the Neptunian depths of space to play with the otters and their enormous boopers... and perhaps be transformed!

"Dont' Boop My Booper" is a three stage booping simulator for Windows with music by Electric Keet. Use your mouse to boop the boopers as they fly across the screen. While some otters want to be booped freely, some may be coy about being booped. And watch out for the boss otters!
